name: Amazon
summary: Amazon.com, Inc. is a global technology and e-commerce leader known for revolutionizing online shopping, cloud computing, digital streaming, and artificial intelligence. Founded by Jeff Bezos in 1994, Amazon has grown from an online bookstore to the world's most comprehensive e-commerce platform. The company's diverse portfolio includes Amazon Web Services (AWS), the world's leading cloud platform; Prime, a subscription service with over 200 million members; and various hardware products like Kindle, Echo, and Ring. Amazon has revolutionized logistics with its vast fulfillment network and is pioneering innovations in artificial intelligence, robotics, and autonomous delivery. Key subsidiaries include Whole Foods Market, Ring, Twitch, and Zappos. Amazon is committed to sustainability with pledges to be carbon neutral by 2040 and is one of the world's largest employers, known for both technological innovation and operational excellence.
